root.name: Shantae and the Pirate's Curse
root.description: OverviewShantae and the Pirate's Curse is a new Shantae title in development at WayForward for the 3DS. The game was revealed via the November 2012 Nintendo Power and will be released digitally on the 3DS eShop in 2013. The story concerns a mutiny by Risky's minions. The minions quest to resurrect Risky's mentor, the Pirate Master, and Risky goes to her nemesis Shantae for help.
